channel.title: Need to convert this
channel.description:
So I have an itemdump, now I want to have the ints for some items.
rune scimitar dump: [code] Item ID = 1333 Item name = Rune scimitar Actions = new String[5]; Actions[0] = null; Actions[1] = Wield; Actions[2] = null; Actions[3] = null; Actions[4] = null; Original model colours = new int[1]; Original model colours[0] = 61; New model colours = new int[1]; New model colours[0] = 36133; Model ID = 2373 Male model ID 1 = 490 Male model ID 2 = -1 Male model ID 3 = -1 Female model ID 1 = 490 Female model ID 2 = -1 Female model ID 3 = -1 Male chat model ID 1 = -1 Male chat model ID 2 = -1 Female chat model ID 1 = -1 Female chat model ID 2 = -1 Model zoom = 1180 Model offset X = -6 Model offset Y = 4 Rotation X = 300 Rotation Y = 1120 Rotation Z = 0 Model lighting = 0 Model shadow = 0 Cert ID = -1 Cert template ID = -1 Model resize X = 128 Model resize Y = 128 Model resize Z = 128 Members object = false Stackable = false Team = 0 Value = 25600 [/code]
Can some one convert this for class8, so I see how to do it. I really have no clue

item.title: Need to convert this
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:11, topic:424569”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=527226.msg3842747#msg3842747 date=1323380585]

Show me a Custom item i’ll try it for u

k thanks,

if(i == 10030)
{
class8.aString170 = "Godsword shard 1";
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[4] = "Drop";
class8.anInt174 = 28152;
class8.anInt165 = -1;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt202 = 0;
class8.aBoolean176 = false;
class8.anInt198 = 249;
class8.anInt181 = 984;
class8.anInt155 = 250000;
class8.anInt200 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt169 = 3;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt179 = 11711;
class8.anInt190 = 549;
class8.aByteArray178 = "It's a Godsword shard 1.".getBytes();
}
if(i == 9999)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";
class8.aString170 = "Improved scimitar";
class8.aByteArray178 = "A Rune Scimitar".getBytes();
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0];
class8.anInt174 = 2373;//Inv & Ground
class8.anInt181 = 1180;
class8.anInt190 = 300;
class8.anInt198 = 1120;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -6;
class8.anInt194 = 4;
class8.anInt165 = 490;//Male Wield View
class8.anInt200 = 490;//Female Wield View
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
}

second int is the one I tried, the scimitar
[/quote]

It looks like it should work… Idk I don’t do delta.[/quote]

it does work but
lemee point out

  • I have an item dump
  • I converted the rune scimitar to ints for class8
  • in the itemdump the ids for rune scimitar and steel are exactly the same
  • so when i add the ints, ingame rune scimitar changes to steel one
  • I tried adding a different itemID but it stays the same

Read full topic
